episodes.title: Somebody's Dead
episodes.plot: A suspicious death at an elementary school fundraiser draws attention to the frictions among three mothers and their families.

episodes.title: Serious Mothering
episodes.plot: Jane deflects questions from Ziggy, Madeline is outraged over a slight from Renata, and Celeste suggests she and Perry see a counselor.

episodes.title: Living the Dream
episodes.plot: Madeline organizes a trip to compete with Amabella's birthday party, Celeste succumbs to Perry's charms, and Jane opens up about her past.

episodes.title: Push Comes to Shove
episodes.plot: Nathan invites Madeline and Ed to a couples' dinner to discuss Abigail, while in light of further evidence of bullying, Ms. Barnes suggests Ziggy be medically evaluated.

episodes.title: Once Bitten
episodes.plot: Madeline is confronted by a desperate Joseph, the school principal scrutinizes Ziggy's behavior, and Dr. Reisman presses Celeste about her marriage.

episodes.title: Burning Love
episodes.plot: Bonnie tells Nathan about Abigail's secret project; Jane confronts Renata; Ed and Madeline have a candid conversation about their lack of passion.

episodes.title: You Get What You Need
episodes.plot: Celeste makes a bold move; Madeline deals with fallout from her past; Jane learns who's really been hurting Amabella.
